title: Falling all in you
lyrics: Sunrise with you on my chest No blinds in the place where I live Still, we're changing our minds here Be yours, be my dear Touch noses, feeling your breath Be my summer in a winter day love I can't see one thing wrong Between the both of us Ooh you know I've been alone for quite a while, haven't I I thought I knew it all Found love but I was wrong More times than enough But since you came along You are bringing out a different kind of me There's no safety net that's underneath, I'm free Falling all in You fell for men who weren't how they appear Trapped up on a tightrope now we're here, we're free Falling all in you Fast forward a couple years, yeah Grown up in the place that we live Laugh 'cause it was only meant to be for one night baby I guess we can't control What's just not up to us Ooh you know I've been alone for quite a while, haven't I I thought I knew it all Found love but I was wrong More times than enough But since you came along You are bringing out a different kind of me There's no safety net that's underneath, I'm free Falling all in You fell for men who weren't how they appear Trapped up on a tightrope now we're here, we're free Falling all in you Every time I see you baby I get lost If I'm dreaming, baby, please don't wake me up Every night I'm with you I fall more in love Now I'm laying by your side Everything feels right since you came along You (Yeah) are bringing out a different kind of me There's no safety net that's underneath, I'm free Falling all in You fell for men who weren't how they appear (Ooh) Trapped up on a tightrope now we're here, we're free Falling all in
